headline: Berkshire Hathaway without Warren Buffett: What to expect
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's (BRK-B, BRK-A) longtime CEO Warren Buffett has retired, with Greg Abel taking the chief executive reins. CFRA Research's equity research vice president Cathy Seifert and Gradient Investments associate portfolio manager Lisa Schreiber join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Buffett's legacy. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway without Warren Buffett: What to expect
